import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Menu, X, Shield, Radar, Database, BarChart3, Grid3x3, Search } from 'lucide-react'; export default function PoliceLandingPage() { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState('home'); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; const features = [ { icon: Shield, title: 'Secure Access Control', description: 'Role permissions, SSO, audit logs.' }, { icon: Radar, title: 'Real-Time Tracking', description: 'Status of firearms, radios, vehicles.' }, { icon: Database, title: 'Centralized Records', description: 'Chain-of-custody and assignments.' }, { icon: BarChart3, title: 'Reports', description: 'Compliance and readiness KPIs.' }, { icon: Grid3x3, title: 'Admin Dashboard', description: 'Manage users, stations, policies.' }, { icon: Search, title: 'Search & Filter', description: 'Locate items by tag or status.' }, ]; const overviewStats = [ { label: 'Checked-out Items', value: '148' }, { label: 'Service Due', value: '23' }, { label: 'Compliance', value: '98.2%' }, ]; const handleNavClick = (name) => { setActiveNav(name); setIsMenuOpen(false); }; return (
{/* Navbar */}
{/* Logo */}
Police Inventory System
{/* Desktop Navigation */}
{['Home', 'Features', 'Login', 'Admin Panel', 'Contact Us'].map((item, index) => ( ))}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation */} {isMenuOpen && (

)}

); })}
